E9: Set Return to Home (RTH) altitude to 100 m (328 ft).
E8: Set maximum flight altitude to 500 m (1640 ft).
E12: Flight mode changed to Starting Motors.
E7: Flight mode changed to Manual Takeoff.
E6: Adjust antennas and make sure they are perpendicular to flight direction of aircraft.
E13: Flight mode changed to Auto Landing.
E5: Make sure the area under the aircraft is safe for landing.
E3: Push throttle down to use force landing.
